SEARCH
Module com.projet.da.projet_da
Package com.projet.da50.projet_da50.model.lesson

Class Lesson

java.lang.Object
com.projet.da50.projet_da50.model.lesson.Lesson
@Entity public class Lesson extends Object
Represents a lesson composed of a title, a list of elements (e.g., text, image, video), and a tag that categorizes the lesson. The lesson is associated with a specific tag from the Tags enum.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      `true` if the element was removed, `false` otherwise.
